attributes.action: I want charities like Mind and Samaritans to be government funded
attributes.additional_details:
5,821 people aged 10 and over took their own lives in 2017
1 in 6 people in England suffer from a mental illness
1 in 4 people in the UK and Northern Ireland suffer from a mental illness
attributes.background:
In 2017 nearly 6,000 people aged 10 and older in the UK alone took their own lives.
In England,1in6 people suffer a mental illness which can impact hugely on their ability to keep a job. Go to school. It can affect a person's ability to make and keep friends and long term relationships

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because both of these charities do receive grants from government in addition to funding from donations and other sources. We're not sure what further action you would like to see.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243332
